reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration
reauth_confirm.description: The SmartThings Customize integration needs to be reauthenticated with your SmartThings account.

abort.cloud_not_enabled: The Home Assistant Cloud integration ({default_config}) is required but not set up.
abort.missing_configuration: The integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.missing_scopes: The authentication token is missing required scopes. Please reauthenticate.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, check the help section.
abort.oauth_error: Received error from OAuth. Please try again.
abort.reauth_account_mismatch: The authenticated account doesn't match the original account.
abort.reauth_location_mismatch: The authenticated account location doesn't match the original location.

oauth2_implementation_unavailable.message: OAuth2 implementation is not available. Please set up application credentials.
